title: China's economy is going through a 'slow, painful, grinding adjustment,' analyst says
content: Beijing's economic outlook for the second half of the year is now "flashing red, or pretty close to red," said Eswar Prasad, professor of international trade and economics at Cornell University.
summary: Beijing's economic outlook for the second half of the year is now "flashing red, or pretty close to red," said Eswar Prasad, professor of international trade and economics at Cornell University.

title: It's a big week for central banks around the world, with a slew of rate moves on the table
content: The Federal Reserve's highly anticipated two-day meeting, which gets underway on Tuesday, is poised to take center stage.
summary: The Federal Reserve's highly anticipated two-day meeting, which gets underway on Tuesday, is poised to take center stage.

title: India can achieve sustainable growth of up to 8% in the coming years, central bank chief says
content: India can achieve sustainable economic growth of up to 8% over the medium term, according to the country's central bank governor.
summary: India can achieve sustainable economic growth of up to 8% over the medium term, according to the country's central bank governor.

title: Suspect in apparent Trump assassination attempt charged with two gun crimes, appears in court
content: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump narrowly survived a prior assassination attempt at a campaign rally two months earlier.
summary: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump narrowly survived a prior assassination attempt at a campaign rally two months earlier.

title: Boeing freezes hiring in sweeping cost cuts as it grapples with factory worker strike
content: Boeing also said it will pause nonessential staff travel and reduce supplier spending as it deals with a strike by more than 30,000 factory workers.
summary: Boeing also said it will pause nonessential staff travel and reduce supplier spending as it deals with a strike by more than 30,000 factory workers.

title: European markets close lower as bumper week for central banks kick off
content: European stocks closed lower as investors prepared for a bumper week of rate decisions from the U.S Federal Reserve and the Bank of England.
summary: European stocks closed lower as investors prepared for a bumper week of rate decisions from the U.S Federal Reserve and the Bank of England.

title: Trump safe, suspect in custody as FBI investigates apparent 'attempted assassination'
content: U.S. Secret Service officers fired shots at a gunman located near the property line of Donald Trump's golf course in Florida.
summary: U.S. Secret Service officers fired shots at a gunman located near the property line of Donald Trump's golf course in Florida.

title: Oracle's Larry Ellison briefly tops Jeff Bezos to become world's second-richest person
content: Oracle is on pace for its best week since 2021, and the rally lifted founder Larry Ellison's net worth past Jeff Bezos for a brief period on Friday.
summary: Oracle is on pace for its best week since 2021, and the rally lifted founder Larry Ellison's net worth past Jeff Bezos for a brief period on Friday.

title: Canada and New Zealand are among the 10 best countries for a comfortable retirement—the U.S. didn't make the list
content: U.S. News and World Report ranked the countries based on an international survey of nearly 17,000 people.
summary: U.S. News and World Report ranked the countries based on an international survey of nearly 17,000 people.

title: Pictures show floods ravaging Central and Eastern Europe as death toll rises
content: Floods brought on by days of heavy rainfalls have been ravaging several European countries, with thousands of people being evacuated the the death toll rising.
summary: Floods brought on by days of heavy rainfalls have been ravaging several European countries, with thousands of people being evacuated the the death toll rising.

title: Trump 'assassination attempt' unleashes flood of misinformation on Chinese social media
content: An apparent assassination attempt on Donald Trump has garnered mass attention from Chinese citizens, including conspiracy theories and criticism of U.S. politics.
summary: An apparent assassination attempt on Donald Trump has garnered mass attention from Chinese citizens, including conspiracy theories and criticism of U.S. politics.

title: India's Bajaj Housing Finance sees shares more than double on debut after stellar IPO
content: The company's shares surged to as much as 161 rupees apiece, jumping about 130% from the top end of its IPO pricing of 70 rupees.
summary: The company's shares surged to as much as 161 rupees apiece, jumping about 130% from the top end of its IPO pricing of 70 rupees.

title: The Fed has the proof it wants that inflation is slowing, but the next move is still up in the air
content: A week's worth of inflation data showed that price pressures have eased substantially.
summary: A week's worth of inflation data showed that price pressures have eased substantially.

title: China's local government debt problems are a hidden drag on economic growth
content: China's persistent consumption slowdown traces back to the country's real estate slump, and its deep ties to local government finances — and debt.
summary: China's persistent consumption slowdown traces back to the country's real estate slump, and its deep ties to local government finances — and debt.

title: Pfizer says its experimental drug for deadly condition that causes appetite and weight loss in cancer patients shows positive trial results
content: The results could pave the way for Pfizer's drug ponsegromab to become the first-ever approved treatment specifically for cancer cachexia.
summary: The results could pave the way for Pfizer's drug ponsegromab to become the first-ever approved treatment specifically for cancer cachexia.

title: CNBC Daily Open: After the Fed’s first cut, where to next?
content: What many are not discussing is the policy trajectory after the Fed's meeting. Following this cut could be a trajectory that will change the market narrative.
summary: What many are not discussing is the policy trajectory after the Fed's meeting. Following this cut could be a trajectory that will change the market narrative.

title: China raising its retirement age may be unpopular but it's much needed, analysts say
content: Economists have long called for an overhaul of the nation's retirement age laws, currently among the world's lowest, that was set in an era with lower life expectancies.
summary: Economists have long called for an overhaul of the nation's retirement age laws, currently among the world's lowest, that was set in an era with lower life expectancies.

title: Why the European Union's tariffs on Chinese automakers may not work
content: Supporters say EU tariffs on Chinese EVs will offset harm of Chinese subsidies. Critics say they will slow EV adoption and hurt some European carmakers.
summary: Supporters say EU tariffs on Chinese EVs will offset harm of Chinese subsidies. Critics say they will slow EV adoption and hurt some European carmakers.

title: Shein and Temu prices are set to get a lot higher as Biden takes aim at retailers linked to China
content: Critics say Shein and Temu are able to offer low prices because they evade import duties under the de minimis exemption — a loophole that could soon be closed.
summary: Critics say Shein and Temu are able to offer low prices because they evade import duties under the de minimis exemption — a loophole that could soon be closed.

title: Brazil supreme court unfreezes assets of Elon Musk's Starlink, X after taking fines
content: Brazil's supreme court announced that it ordered funds be moved from Starlink and X bank accounts to pay for fines levied against Elon Musk's social network.
summary: Brazil's supreme court announced that it ordered funds be moved from Starlink and X bank accounts to pay for fines levied against Elon Musk's social network.

title: Biden targets Shein, Temu with new rules to curb alleged 'abuse' of U.S. trade loophole
content: Under a new White House rule proposal, Chinese exports subject to U.S. tariffs would no longer be eligible for the de minimis shipping loophole.
summary: Under a new White House rule proposal, Chinese exports subject to U.S. tariffs would no longer be eligible for the de minimis shipping loophole.

title: Most Gen Z Brits want to 'be their own boss' — but one expert says they'll face a reality check

title: Tesla Semi fire in California took 50,000 gallons of water to extinguish
content: The National Transportation Safety Board said on Friday that a Tesla Semi crash last month closed down an artery of Interstate 80 for 15 hours.
